t: Pukemark, Sweatyrocks, Demonlick: Made-for-Amazon Brand Names Are Getting Ridiculously Surreal
s: October 14, 2020 - It’s common to come across unfamiliar brands on Amazon, where sellers are constantly fashioning product lines and whole brands around what shoppers are searching for. But here were a series of names that were not only unknown to me, but also quite perplexing: Artfish, Wishpig, Sweatyrocks, Demonlick, and Pukemark. These were puzzling compound words. I wasn’t sure if they supposed to be funny ...
